content: Looking at the spreadsheets, I see that there's a bunch of places where bindings for Coding/CodeableConcept are represented at 'code list' types in the spreadsheet
I'm deprecating this practice as of now, because of impending UTG changes.
what this means is that the build will continue to support them - probably until R4 is published. but after that, they will have to convert to codesystem/value set pairs stored in resources.
code lists bound to elements of type 'code' will not be affected.
I'm telling you this now because as you are editing the spreadshets, and have an opportunity, it would be good to migrate them out of the spreadshets
Can you expand on "convert to codesystem/value set pairs in resources"? Thanks
Take a look in source/observation at codesystem-observation-category.xml and valueset-observation-category.xml
Damn!... that was a good cheat too...

What's the mechanism for adding ConceptMaps if we want to include mappings to SNOMED, v2, v3, etc. when defining value sets. Doing it for CodeLists was easy. Not sure how to do it using the independent ValueSet route at all...
there isn't a direct one. got any example?
Not off the top of my head. Perhaps just a column on the bindings page that lets you list the URLs of the ConceptMaps?
